4.8.18  8:39 pm   For you, how much of a song is planned out before going into recording in terms of instrumentation?

here

      I know you've said that you like to know the full, exact structure of how the song will go (how long each part is, how many verses/choruses, etc). But do you typically just kind of have a melody in mind,

     and during the recording process is when you come up with the bassline and drum parts and fills and actual arrangement,

      chord voicings,

     and all that stuff? Or do you have each part pretty much in your head before going into it?
